casebody.data:
PINE
v.
WAL-MART ASSOCIATES, INC. #1552, et al. 335A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 31, 2018 Holly M. Stott, Attorney at Law, M. Duane Jones, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Linda Stephens, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Wal-Mart Associates, Inc. #1552, et al. David A. Shelby, Attorney at Law, Salisbury, for Pine, Patricia. Vernon Sumwalt, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for N.C. Advocates for Justice.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 31st of May 2018 by Defendants:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 31st of May 2018."

Defendants shall have up to and including the 22nd day of June 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
